Action.author: passkit
Action.body: CurrentlyÂ eventhub timeout is hardcoded as an int of 5 (which is 5 nanoseconds). Elsewhere, this is bumped up to 100ms (timeouts of less than 100ms are set to 100ms). This will work fine if you are running fabric locally, but fails 100% of the time when running over a network. Before deploying the SDK, I always need to manually change the timeout to 5 seconds.
